plot: A tale of fantasy about Jorge, a humble peddler facing financial troubles. When it seems that he'll lose his business, he turns to a witch who offers him a talisman able to grant his wishes...
title: Talismán
plot_es: A tale of fantasy about Jorge, a humble peddler facing financial troubles. When it seems that he'll lose his business, he turns to a witch who offers him a talisman able to grant his wishes...
plot_en: A tale of fantasy about Jorge, a humble peddler facing financial troubles. When it seems that he'll lose his business, he turns to a witch who offers him a talisman able to grant his wishes...

produce.name: Escuela de Cinematografía y Actuación de Monterrey The Films Workshops
